channel.title: Help me please
channel.description: how do i get santa to sell anything? (im usin testscape as a source) and how do i make ppl mods using testscape?

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

To make mod admin search for this in client.java

nvi ible

then change his name to your’s that you use for your server.And to make other people mod’s jsut change the names below that to there name and change the number 3 to 2.

If you already have the santa spawned by putting it in your autospawn then to make it trade go to your client.java and search for this.

else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop

And under it add this…

} else if (NPCID == 1699) { //Rare Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; //santa

Just change the NPCID to the id of your npc and change the 44 to your shop number , change the rare to your shop name and then you won’t have to change the santa cause that’s the name of the NPC you want any way.

Hope it help’s

Read full topic
